dct_title_s: Rough sketch map of the Paámiārs and Wakhaán : to accompany a report by Lieut. Colonel T. E. Gordon.
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:1,650,000 (E 69°30'00"--E 78°30'00"/N 41°00'00"--N 35°00'00"). Covers eastern Tajikistan and small parts of Kyrgyzstan, Afghanistan, and Pakistan."From an original prepared & drawn by Lt. Col. Gordon, O. S. I., & Capt. Biddulph.""Lithd. in the Qr. Mr. General's Office.""Simla, September 1874."
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dct_publisher_sm: Quarter Master General's Office ; Shimla, India
